comments:
I20050329-0010

- new workspace
- switch Package Explorer to Show > Working Sets
- open context menu on "Other Projects"
-> the messages below are logged
The same happens after the last project has been deleted from a user-defined
working set.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-03-29 14:53:23.528
!MESSAGE Error adapting org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkingSet to
org.eclipse.core.resources.mapping.ResourceMapping. Contribution
org.eclipse.compare.MenuGroups is being ignored

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-03-29 14:53:23.558
!MESSAGE Error adapting org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkingSet to
org.eclipse.core.resources.mapping.ResourceMapping. Contribution
org.eclipse.team.ccvs.ui.ResourceMapperContributions is being ignored

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-03-29 14:53:23.588
!MESSAGE Error adapting org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkingSet to
org.eclipse.core.resources.mapping.ResourceMapping. Contribution
org.eclipse.team.ui.ResourceContributions is being ignored

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-03-29 14:53:23.608
!MESSAGE Error adapting selection to
org.eclipse.core.resources.mapping.ResourceMapping. Contribution
org.eclipse.team.ccvs.ui.ResourceMapperContributions is being ignored

The log entries are generated by Platform/UI. Please advise if there is
something JDT/UI can do here to avoid the entries.
Michael, any idea where these are coming from?

There coming from the object contribution manager. It appears that the code 
makes the assumption that anything that can potentially adapt to a 
ResourceMapping always does. In this case, an empty working set returns null 
when asked to adapt to a resource mapping. These should probably be debug 
messages instead of logged errors.
*** Bug 95218 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fix in HEAD.  Added new debugging option.
*** Bug 93223 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=21880)
Patch for ObjectActionContributor

Patch to address the problem.  I AND'd when I should've nested.
We won't be requesting a rebuild for this but we will put it in if anything else is requested.
